properties.name: spring.datasource.mysql.jdbc-url
properties.description: Connection String used to connect in MySQL Database

properties.name: spring.datasource.mysql.username
properties.description: Username used to connect in MySQL Database

properties.name: spring.datasource.mysql.password
properties.description: Password used to connect in MySQL Database

properties.name: spring.datasource.postgres.jdbc-url
properties.description: Connection String used to connect in PostgreSQL Database

properties.name: spring.datasource.postgres.username
properties.description: Username used to connect in PostgreSQL Database

properties.name: spring.datasource.postgres.password
properties.description: Password used to connect in PostgreSQL Database
